title: Direct Lending's Ross on LendingClub's Loan Sale Abuse (Audio)
itunes:title: Direct Lending's Ross on LendingClub's Loan Sale Abuse (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Brendan Ross, Founder and CEO of Direct Lending Investments, LLC, on LendingClub plunging after findings of loan-sale abuse, and a look at the lending landscape.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
